amendment.description: To make sure the Senate can increase the Federal minimum wage to $17 an hour by a simple majority vote.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2126 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 184.

action.text: Amendment SA 2126 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 1717. To make sure the Senate can increase the Federal minimum wage to $17 an hour by a simple majority vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2126 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 1717.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2126 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 184.
